channel.title: 317 [PI] auto donation
channel.description: hey how can i fix so this: [code]c.donatorPoints += 100;[/code] give a partyhat instead of 100 donator points?

item.title: 317 [PI] auto donation
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“makersprivate123, post:7, topic:472907”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=590763.msg4180046#msg4180046 date=1355411526]
Simple.
You make it do something like this (it will require you to add some sort of ‘point’ system into your save games):

                if(playerCommand.startsWith("donorkit" && c.dPoints == 0){
                c.getItems().addItem(955, 10000000);
                c.getItems().addItem(1149, 1);
                c.getItems().addItem(4151, 1);
                }else{
                       c.sendMessage("You already got your Donor Kit!");
                 }

[/quote]

Like if I make something in save (I know how)
like gotDonorKit = 1
then I just add

else if(c.gotDonorKit >= 1){ c.sendMessage("You already got your Donor Kit."); } [/quote]
Yeah, pretty much.
You’ll also need to make the command give you +1 gotDonorKit, or what you want it named…

Read full topic

item.title: 317 [PI] auto donation
item.dc:creator: @makersprivate123 makersprivate123
item.description:
@makersprivate123 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:472907”][quote author=makersprivate123 link=topic=590763.msg4179917#msg4179917 date=1355390025]

Under it add this code.

Replace the “#” with the (item id, amount). It should work.

I could use some help from you…
How do I make this so you can only use it ONCE?

		if(playerCommand.startsWith("donorkit"){
		c.getItems().addItem(955, 10000000);
		c.getItems().addItem(1149, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(4151, 1);
		}

[/quote]
Simple.
You make it do something like this (it will require you to add some sort of ‘point’ system into your save games):

if(playerCommand.startsWith("donorkit" && c.dPoints == 0){ c.getItems().addItem(955, 10000000); c.getItems().addItem(1149, 1); c.getItems().addItem(4151, 1); }else{ c.sendMessage("You already got your Donor Kit!"); } [/quote]

Like if I make something in save (I know how)
like gotDonorKit = 1
then I just add

else if(c.gotDonorKit >= 1){
c.sendMessage("You already got your Donor Kit.");
}

Read full topic

if(playerCommand.startsWith("donorkit"){ c.getItems().addItem(955, 10000000); c.getItems().addItem(1149, 1); c.getItems().addItem(4151, 1); } [/quote]
Simple.
You make it do something like this (it will require you to add some sort of ‘point’ system into your save games):

                if(playerCommand.startsWith("donorkit" && c.dPoints == 0){
                c.getItems().addItem(955, 10000000);
                c.getItems().addItem(1149, 1);
                c.getItems().addItem(4151, 1);
                }else{
                       c.sendMessage("You already got your Donor Kit!");
